data.title: Poor drunk Waiter
data.statement: The Waiter Niki daily works for a pittance. After a hard day, he wants to treat himself to a drink. But he can only afford that with a decent tip. So if he gets more than a certain percentage of the tip in total on one day that he can drink until he forgets the f*** job.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
read percentage:int
loop N read bill:float tip:float 
write DRUNK/THIRSTY
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of tables he served.
<<Line 2:>> An integer [[percentage]] for the percentage of the bill he needs as tip to get drunk.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> Two space-separated floats [[bill]] for the amount of the bill and [[tip]] for the amount of the tip.
data.outputDescription: The Waiter is drunk or not: {{ "DRUNK" }}/{{ "THIRSTY"}}.
